Name: id
Description: Unique song identifier across Billboard dataset.

Name: band_singer
Description: Primary performer, band, or singer name.

Name: year
Description: Year when the song appeared on Billboard chart.

Name: danceability
Description: Suitability for dancing (0.0–1.0). Combines tempo, rhythm stability, and beat strength.

Name: energy
Description: Perceived intensity and activity of a track (0.0–1.0).

Name: loudness
Description: Overall loudness of the track in decibels (–60 dB to 0 dB).

Name: speechiness
Description: Presence of spoken words (0.0–1.0). Higher values indicate more speech-like recordings.

Name: acousticness
Description: Confidence measure of whether the track is acoustic (0.0–1.0).

Name: instrumentalness
Description: Predicts whether a track contains no vocals. Closer to 1 = more instrumental.

Name: tempo
Description: Estimated tempo in beats per minute (BPM).

Name: popularity
Description: Spotify popularity index (0–100), based on play count and recency.

Name: hit_group
Description: Binary factor indicating Top10 vs NotTop10 chart membership.
